projects.title: VASTRAM
description: Vastram is a complete e-commmerce site built for small businesses, the site provides excellent design and category display options.
it is built with react and nodejs, the site uses bulma for implementing best in class design practices.

projects.title: KARMA
description: Built with react and firebase, karma is a modern planner app with support for projects, tasks and timeline.
Karma utilises firebase on the backend for authentication and managing data.

projects.title: Hotel Website
description: This beautifull website is built for needs of a hotel chain supporting multiple locations and restaurant
it's built with react and tailwind to provide faster load times and a smooth experience.
